name: @sayari/toolkit
description: a collection of utility functions for Sayari Graph

scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.pub:pre: npm run validate && npm version prerelease && npm run deploy
scripts.pub:patch: npm run validate && npm version patch && npm run deploy
scripts.pub:minor: npm run validate && npm version minor && npm run deploy
scripts.pub:major: npm run validate && npm version minor && npm run deploy

author: Mikey Gower
